trans-unit.source: Implements the standard console logger that outputs event data to the console window during a build.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> to apply to the logger.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"></xref>, and <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"></xref> values.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> to apply to the logger.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> for the logger to use.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"></xref> for the logger to use.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"></xref> for the logger to use.
Adds the specified parameter name and value to the logger.
The parameter name to add to the logger.
The parameter value to assign to the `parameterName`.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.CustomEventRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.CustomBuildEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Registers the logger for the specified events.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource"></xref> to register with the logger.
Registers the logger for the specified events.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource"></xref> to register with the logger.
The number of nodes to initialize.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.MessageRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets the parameters passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
The parameters passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Stops the logger and releases all resources.
The default console logger does not need to release any resources.
This method does nothing.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display messages when new projects are started during the build.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display messages when new projects are started during the build; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> level of the logger.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> level of the logger.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
